description: Krisztian Szabo and Martin Hubai are in the midst of fleshy indulgence when George Vidanov arrives seeking help for his injured climbing partner.  Martin calls Mountain Rescue, and George prepares to depart, but Krisztian and Martin have other plans.  'Mountain rescue will take care of things,' Martin explains, 'why not stay?'  Soon George is sandwiched between Krisztian and Martin, sucking and playing with their uncut cocks.  The threesome fuck and suck their way into a frenzy....finally blowing their urgent loads and cooling their furious desire.
title: Full Expedition, Scene #04
